Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stDBMNSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements the N split algorithm.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Member Function Documentation

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
stCount stDBMNSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::Distribute (  stDBMNode *  oldNode,
tDBMCollection *  returnCollection,
tSubtreeInfo *  promo,
EvaluatorType *  metricEvaluator
) 
 

Distributes objects between 2 nodes and returnCollection.

Parameters:
oldNode The recycled node to be use in this method.
returnCollection The returning node containing objects that were not covered by the others nodes.
promo Representatives of nodes.
metricEvaluator The metric evaluator to be used to compute distances.
